title: Sorority Run
description: Welcome to Delta Nu Sorority, where the sisters live fabulously and study occasionally. Enter Keely Urban, a girl with polish, as well as grit. When her "extracurricular" activities draw the attention of the City of Mesa police department, her simple life becomes far more complicated.Particularly when she meets Vincent Morelli. This story is a serial that concludes with a cliffhanger. Due to mature sex scenes, it is intended for those eighteen years of age or older.
author: Alexa Salinger
